props.text: The World First Dynamic Component Assembly Framework
A framework that will make you think: "Why hasn't anyone done this until now?"

props.title: UI Framework Agnostic
props.body: Seamlessly integrate with any UI framework of your choice. Enjoy the freedom to choose and switch between frameworks effortlessly.

props.title: AI/LLM Page Generation
props.body: Unlock the full potential of AI by generating custom pages in seconds. Simplify your workflow with AI-driven page creation. Support offline LLMs like Ollama.

props.title: Dynamic Page Loading
props.body: Experience ultimate flexibility with dynamic page loading. Easily update and modify content without any hassle. Click here to see the original json!
